food_items.name: Pizza Margherita
food_items.description: A classic pizza made with tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil.

food_items.name: Grilled Salmon
food_items.description: Fresh salmon grilled to perfection and served with a side of vegetables.

food_items.name: Pad Thai
food_items.description: A traditional Thai dish made with stir-fried noodles, vegetables, peanuts, and your choice of meat or tofu.

food_items.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
food_items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, and parmesan cheese tossed with Caesar dressing.

food_items.name: Pasta Carbonara
food_items.description: Spaghetti tossed with a creamy sauce made from eggs, bacon, and parmesan cheese.
